job_description: Cadex Electronics is looking for a motivated Co-Op student or intern who is expert in C programing and is familiar with Firmware development. She/He will be working closely with the research team at Cadex to assist with testing and validation of new algorithm and hardware that is designed for Battery rapid testers.  Knowledge of FFT and optimization methods is a plus.
